grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 拘束【コウソク】restriction, restraint, binding, constraint
拘禁【コウキン】detention, custody, confinement, internment
kun reading compounds: 関わる【かかわる】to be affected, to be influenced, to be concerned with, to have to do with, to stick to (opinions)
